ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Weiss,Don Heck,Ernie Chan,Frank Brunner,Frank Brunner,Don Heck,Ernie Chua
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thing on the Roof!: A search for a treasure in Central America unleashes a terrible creature that pursues the treasure-hunter to his doom.
All the Shapes of Fear!: A motorcyclist accidentally runs over a child, in spite of an attempt by his future self to warn of the danger.
The Girl Who Cast No Shadow: A journalist is lured to his death by a woman who seems to need his help, but who is actually enslaved to an ancient demon.
ComicInfo.Title: The Thing on the Roof!; All the Shapes of Fear!; The Girl Who Cast No Shadow
ComicInfo.Writer: Gardner Fox,George Alec Effinger,Roy Thomas,Roy Thomas,Robert E. Howard,George Alec Effinger,Gardner Fox
